name: Phi Clogs
short_description: This is an extraordinary type of fashionable medical shoes. The secret is in a special (patented) flexible sole that has only one goal ... stand long and go without pain. The airflow eliminates harmful vibrations while walking and prevents back and legs pain. Our clogs are 100% handmade from natural material. With massage gel in the heel area, they lead to natural body posture, correct load distribution of the spine and muscle activation. A combination of fashion, comfort and health. They fit to every foot so you will enjoy every step.

The airflow eliminates harmful vibrations while walking and prevents back and legs pain. Our clogs are 100% handmade from natural material. With massage gel in the heel area, they lead to natural body posture, correct load distribution of the spine and muscle activation. A combination of fashion, comfort and health. They fit to every foot so you will enjoy every step.
